metadata.title: CVE-2024-53104 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: uvcvideo: Skip parsing frames of type UVC_VS_UNDEFINED inuvc_parse_formatThis can lead to out of bounds writes since frames of this type were nottaken into account when calculating the size of the frames buffer inuvc_parse_streaming.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
